full_description:
AUN AKEY6 6800 Lumens Full HD Portable Projector

The AUN AKEY6 6800 Lumens Portable Projector has a native 1920x1080 resolution, a 60Hz display, a 2000:1 contrast ratio, and a lamp life of 30,000 hours. The revolutionary 6,800 Lumen video projector meets all audio-visual requirements. It has a large projection screen, with a screen size of 46"-300" and a projection distance ranging from 5.15ft-30.18ft. The AKEY6 projector makes use of modern electronic technology to automatically change the keystone correction of 50°. This portable projector has two HDMI ports, an AV port, a VGA port, a USB port, an SD card slot, and an audio-out port. AUN AKEY6 allows you to connect to a variety of devices such as a TV Stick, X-BOX, PS4, PC, Laptop, USB sticks, SD cards, Android or iOS smartphones, and so on.
